name: Jammies!
description:
This was a game made for the Webster  Game Development Club's spring game jam, for which the theme was National Love Your Pet Day!

Raise a Jammie of your own! Feed it, play with it, and train it until it can evolve into a completely new Jammie!

Game Controls: Fire Training:

Move your mouse side to side to move your pet, and click to launch fireballs to hit the targets!

Plant Training:

Move your mouse side to side to catch the beans!

Fly Training:

Click to give yourself a boost up into the air and avoid obstacles!

Swim Training:

Left click to move left, and right click to move right. Don't run into any rocks!

Digging for Treasure:

Click on the rubies to pick them up. Don't pick up any bombs, though!

Team:

Rebekah Myers: UI, Art, Programming

Justin Baldridge: Programming, Game Design

Nicholas O'Connell: Programming, Game Design

Brian Pham: Art
